Bash(--title "Implement Performance Dashboard with Returns, Sharpe Ratio, and Volatility Metrics" )

Bash(--body "## Overview
Implement a comprehensive Performance Dashboard as part of Phase 2 roadmap to provide advanced portfolio analytics including returns, risk metrics, and performance visualizations.

## Requirements
- Portfolio returns calculation (daily, monthly, yearly)
- Risk metrics including Sharpe ratio and volatility
- Performance visualizations and charts  
- Benchmark comparison capabilities
- Real-time updates from existing portfolio data

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Display portfolio returns across multiple time periods
- [ ] Calculate and display Sharpe ratio
- [ ] Show volatility metrics
- [ ] Include performance charts/visualizations
- [ ] Compare performance against benchmarks
- [ ] Integrate with existing SnapTrade portfolio data
- [ ] Responsive design matching current UI

## Technical Context
- Part of Phase 2: Enhanced Analytics
- Builds on existing portfolio tracking from Phase 1
- Should leverage existing SQLAlchemy models and FastAPI endpoints
- Frontend uses React + TypeScript with Recharts for visualizations

## Priority
High - Core feature for Phase 2 completion

Relates to roadmap item: Performance Dashboard - Returns, Sharpe ratio, volatility metrics \`M\`" )
